title: Heart Disease Prediction System
summary: ML-based prediction model using clinical data to assess heart disease risk.
details:
Built an ML-based prediction model using clinical data to assess heart disease risk.

Achieved 97% sensitivity and 98% specificity using SMOTE and cross-validation techniques.

Deployed the model via Streamlit/Gradio for real-time, user-friendly risk assessment.

title: StartupKart
summary: Goods taxation and price analysis system to calculate GST and evaluate product costs efficiently.
details:
Developed StartupKart, a goods taxation and price analysis system to calculate GST and evaluate product costs efficiently.

Analyzed past 10 years of price data to identify trends and support informed purchasing decisions.

Implemented a recommendation feature using historical and live datasets to suggest optimal buying options.

title: ResoNet
summary: IoT and GIS-enabled platform for MSMEs real-time access, booking, and monitoring of shared industrial infrastructure.
details:
Developed ResoNet, an IoT and GIS-enabled platform to provide MSMEs real-time access, booking, and monitoring of shared industrial infrastructure.

Integrated low-cost IoT sensors with RFID/QR-based access control and live GIS mapping to improve transparency and resource utilization.

Designed analytics dashboards to track usage trends, optimize facility management, and reduce production delays.
